“We used Party Decor Hire to help decorate the beautiful Lalapanzi Lodge for my sister’s wedding. Working with Party Decor Hire was fantastic, we managed to work everything out from the UK and on the big day and they brought the vision to life! Everything was Beautiful. I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend working with them. Thank you for making such a special day that little bit more beautiful.”

– Beth Thomas UK

[/et_pb_slide][et_pb_slide _builder_version=”4.24.3″ _module_preset=”default” body_font=”||||||||” global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_transition=”on”]

“Everything was delivered on time and collected timeously. I wouldn’t deal with any other company. Thank you so much for making my son’s 21st hassle-free.”

– Elizabeth

[/et_pb_slide][/et_pb_slider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
